# React Portfolio - Jammana Praveen Kumar Reddy

This is a modern React portfolio website built with Vite and TypeScript, showcasing professional QA and testing expertise.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Scaffold the Vite React project
- [x] Install dependencies

- [x] Launch the project

## Project Overview

A professional portfolio website showcasing:
- Software Test Engineer profile with 15+ months experience
- Professional summary and contact information
- Detailed work experience at TECH4BILLION MEDIA PVT LTD (CHINGARI)
- Comprehensive skills in testing types, tools, and frameworks
- Certifications from QSpiders (Manual, Automation, API Testing)
- Education details (B.Tech Civil Engineering)
- Contact links and social profiles
- Fully responsive design

## Getting Started

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

Server will run at: http://localhost:5173/

## Technologies

- React 18+
- TypeScript
- Vite
- CSS3 with Flexbox & Grid
- Responsive Mobile Design

## File Structure

```
src/
├── App.tsx          # Main portfolio component with all sections
├── App.css          # Comprehensive styling
├── main.tsx         # React entry point
└── index.css        # Global styles

index.html           # HTML entry point
package.json         # Dependencies and scripts
tsconfig.json        # TypeScript configuration
vite.config.ts       # Vite configuration
```
